law.catch_line: Classification and assessment of historic property used for commercial or certain nonprofit purposes.

text.section:
Sec. 16A-19. Classification and assessment of historic property used for commercial or certain nonprofit purposes.
Miami-Dade County hereby elects to adopt the classification and assessment method provide in Section 193.503 of Florida Statutes (1997). Accordingly, subject to the definitions, conditions, and procedures established by that Section, Historic Property qualifying under that Section shall be assessed based upon actual use.
Any such classification shall terminate upon repeal of Section 193.503 Florida Statutes or the repeal or sunset of this provision.
